title: Development and Application Process of an Online Learning Perception Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and experience in online learning environments
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in developing and empirically validating online learning perception scales for science professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four dimensions (instructor characteristics, social presence, instructional design, trust) constituting the online learning perception scale.
Learners can develop survey items tailored to target group characteristics and apply reliability/validity verification procedures.
Learners can perform exploratory/confirmatory factor analysis on collected data using SPSS/R and interpret the results.
Learners can write final scale reports through project-based assessment and propose implementation strategies for field application.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
